lead_paragraph: A school district that includes students from Ferguson, Mo., will continue for now its method of electing board members at large, despite a lawsuit challenging the process as discriminatory.
snippet: A school district that includes students from Ferguson, Mo., will continue for now its method of electing board members at large, despite a lawsuit challenging the process as discriminatory....

headline.main: Court Keeps Vote Method, Seen as Biased, Intact in Missouri School District
headline.print_headline: Court Keeps  School Vote  In Ferguson  As Is for Now
